Name: Base Station License, Car 24 Transportation, Inc., Manhattan
Title: A Local Law in relation to the approval of a determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Car 24 Transportation, Inc. for the renewal of a license to operate a base station in the borough of Manhattan.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

	Section one.  The determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Car 24 Transportation, Inc. for the renewal of a license to operate a base station at 1489 First Avenue in the borough of Manhattan is hereby approved. 
      ï¿½2. This local law shall take effect immediately. 

LS#924
